law.catch_line: Other material to be filed with compiler.

text.section: The forms required by subsection (1) of this section shall be obtained from the regulations compiler.

law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 8, effective July 12, 2012. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 12, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 11, effective June 24, 2003. -- Amended 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 410, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 516, sec. 25, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1988 Ky. Acts ch. 425, sec. 8, effective July 15, 1988. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 417, sec. 23, effective April 13, 1984.
